productDescription: The Plain ring is a minimalistic looking handmade 14K golden ring. The shiny polished surface gives this ring a classic look. Wear it individually or stack this ring up with some other golden rings for a more rebellious style.

optionalInfo.production: Handmade in our Amsterdam based Atelier of recycled gold.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: We pack your order in plastic-free package material. Free shipping on all NL orders.
